column4: is there a way for me to lock a shared folder on ubuntu so windows machines cant access it with out password?
confused by the fact that "lock" and "without a password" appear in the same sentence
sorry about that, what I meant ppl have to have a password to access the shared folder
those should allow you to establish passwords on shares
ok thanks, i'll take a look at that.
one question, if I'm sharing a folder with many folders in it, can I lock just one folder with in the shared folder?
